alert.note: Alert for Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 2:55AM CDT until June 10 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN SEDGWICK COUNTY... At 254 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mcconnell Air Force Base to near Viola, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Haysville, Goddard, Cheney, Downtown Wichita, Eastborough, Eisenhower National Airport, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita, Lake Afton and Oaklawn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
